content: Enough with the pleasantries. What programming languages are you proficient in?
Well, then how do you plan to succeed in this software engineering role without any programming language skills?
I was hoping of talking my way through it...
Talking your way through coding? Good luck with that. What's your name?
Fine, Mystery Candidate. Here's a challenging question for you: Can you explain the principles of object-oriented programming even though you have no programming language skills?
